    • addRule

    • addSymbolToAlphabet

      public boolean addSymbolToAlphabet(String s) throws InvalidCharacterException
      Adds symbol to the alphabet of the grammar. Automatically adds it to terminal symbols if its lowercase or a digit. Automatically adds it to non-terminal symbols if its uppercase.
      Parameters:
      s -
      Returns:
      true if the symbol was not already in set
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterException

    • removeRule

      public boolean removeRule(int n) throws RuleNotFoundException
      Removes the Nth rule in a grammar, indexes begin at 0
      Parameters:
      n - Which rule should be removed
      Returns:
      Whether the rule was successfully removed
      Throws:
      RuleNotFoundException

      public String getOriginalFile()
